text.p: Write down the equations corresponding to the last matrix. Is there a triple [mathjaxinline](x_1,x_2,x_3)[/mathjaxinline] that satisfies these equations (in other words, is the system consistent)? If so, is the solution unique?

choice.text: The system is consistent and has a unique solution
The system is consistent but has more than one solution

font.p: The equations are [mathjaxinline]x_1 = -1[/mathjaxinline], [mathjaxinline]x_2 - x_3 = 1[/mathjaxinline], and [mathjaxinline]0 = 0[/mathjaxinline]. There are many triples [mathjaxinline](x_1, x_2, x_3)[/mathjaxinline] that satisfy these equations; for instance, [mathjaxinline](-1, 1, 0)[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline](-1, 2, 1)[/mathjaxinline] are two solutions.
